name: Kuo-toa
lore: Kuo-toa are aquatic humanoids that dwell in the lightless depths of the Underdark. Driven mad by eons of exile beneath the surface, these fish-like beings worship strange gods of their own fevered imagining. Their collective fervor can sometimes coalesce into real divine power, manifesting the very deities they dream into existence. Kuo-toa organize into theocratic communities led by priestly figures, raiding the waterways of the Underdark and capturing surface dwellers to offer as sacrifices.

traits.name: Amphibious
traits.description: The kuo-toa can breathe air and water.

traits.name: Otherworldly Perception
traits.description: The kuo-toa can sense the presence of any creature within 30 feet of it that has the Invisible condition. It can also sense whether a creature is using a disguise or illusion to alter its appearance.

traits.name: Slippery
traits.description: The kuo-toa has Advantage on ability checks and saving throws made to escape a Grapple.

traits.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
traits.description: While in sunlight, the kuo-toa has Disadvantage on attack rolls and on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

actions.name: Spear
actions.description: Melee or Ranged Attack Roll: +3, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft. Hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) Piercing damage, or 5 (1d8 + 1) Piercing damage if used with two hands in melee.

hit.additionalEffects: Or 5 (1d8 + 1) Piercing damage if used with two hands in melee.

actions.name: Net
actions.description: Ranged Attack Roll: +2, range 5/15 ft., one Large or smaller creature. Hit: The target has the Restrained condition. A creature can take an action to make a DC 10 Strength (Athletics) check, freeing the Restrained creature on a success. The net has AC 10, 5 HP, and Immunity to Bludgeoning, Poison, and Psychic damage.

hit.additionalEffects: A creature can take an action to make a DC 10 Strength (Athletics) check, freeing the Restrained creature on a success. The net has AC 10, 5 HP, and Immunity to Bludgeoning, Poison, and Psychic damage.

reactions.name: Sticky Shield
reactions.description: When a creature the kuo-toa can see misses it with a melee attack roll, the kuo-toa tries to catch the weapon used in the attack. The attacker must succeed on a DC 11 Strength saving throw, or the weapon becomes stuck to the kuo-toa's shield. While stuck, the weapon can't be used. A creature can take an action to make a DC 11 Strength (Athletics) check, freeing the weapon on a success.
reactions.trigger: A creature the kuo-toa can see misses it with a melee attack roll.

onFailure.effects: The weapon becomes stuck to the kuo-toa's shield. While stuck, the weapon can't be used. A creature can take an action to make a DC 11 Strength (Athletics) check, freeing the weapon on a success.
